summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2857, for the improvement of Alki Avenue, from Rhode Island Street to the northern terminus of 63rd Avenue Southwest, all in the City of Seattle, by grading, filling, bulkheading, planking, constructing sidewalks and providing for the necessary surface drainage,, and the necessary adjustments to existing trestle, under Ordinance No. 34644 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
